root.name: int 整數

example.code: int a; // Declare variable "a" of type int a = 23; // Assign "a" the value 23 int b = -256; // Declare variable "b" and assign it the value -256 int c = a + b; // Declare variable "c" and assign it the sum of "a" and "b"

root.description: 整數的資料形態。不含小數點的數字。整數最大可至2,147,483,647，最小可至-2,147,483,648。其資訊儲存於32位元組中。
